articles.description: Chelsea manager Emma Hayes says Kadeisha Buchanan's sending-off against Barcelona was the "worst decision in Champions League history".
articles.title: Chelsea v Barcelona: Emma Hayes slams Champions League red card

articles.description: England seal a third consecutive Six Nations Grand Slam against a 14-player France side in Bordeaux after Assia Khalfaoui's second-half red card.
articles.title: Women's Six Nations 2024: France 21-42 England - Red Roses win Grand Slam

articles.description: Burnley condemn tragedy chanting at Old Trafford
articles.title: Manchester United v Burnley: Clarets condemn 'tragedy chanting'

articles.description: Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah says if he speaks "there will be fire" after he argued with manager Jurgen Klopp on the touchline during the 2-2 Premier League draw at West Ham.
articles.title: Liverpool: Mohamed Salah says 'if I speak there will be fire' after Jurgen Klopp row

articles.description: Axel Disasi has a stoppage-time goal disallowed but Chelsea come from two goals down to dent Aston Villa's top-four hopes at Villa Park.
articles.title: Chelsea come back to dent Villa's top-four hopes

articles.description: Sean Dyche hailed his "biggest" achievement as a manager after leading Everton to Premier League survival with three games to spare.
articles.title: Everton: Sean Dyche hails 'biggest' feat as boss after Toffees seal survival

articles.description: Manchester United are "one of the most dynamic and entertaining teams" in the Premier League, says manager Erik ten Hag.
articles.title: Manchester United one of 'most entertaining' Premier League teams, says Erik ten Hag

articles.description: England striker Harry Kane scores twice in Bayern Munich's win over Eintracht Frankfurt to set a new personal record for his most goals in a season.
articles.title: Kane sets personal record with double in Bayern win

articles.description: Rafael Nadal reaches the Madrid Open third round with an impressive straight-set win over Australian Alex de Minaur.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Rafael Nadal beats Alex de Minaur in second round

articles.description: Watch as commentators at the Washinton Nationals v Los Angeles Dodgers game are joined in the commentary box by a furry friend, Pablo the dog.
articles.title: MLB: Pablo the Dog joins baseball commentary booth
